name: Underwater Diving (Mars Touch Studio)
description:
The game is at the PROTO 01 stage.

  • No music yet.

  • No sound yet.

  • The player is currently immortal.

  • Diver controls still need to be improved.

  • The fish currently all have the same basic AI.

  • There is only one level for now.

  • The demo level can be finished in less than two minutes.

  • Available for Windows 32 and 64 bit.
Controls

The game is optimized to be played with a gamepad!

  • Hold LEFT STICK direction to SWIM
  • Press BUTTON A to RUSH (powerful acceleration)

Press ESCAPE to quit the game at any time!

Last updated on May 30, 2022
